grafana_organization.description: The grafana_organization resource allows a Grafana organization to be created.

name.description: The display name for the Grafana organization created.

admin_user.description: The login name of the configured

create_users.description: Whether or not to create Grafana users specified

admins.description: A list of email addresses corresponding to users who

editors.description: A list of email addresses corresponding to users who

viewers.description: A list of email addresses corresponding to users who

org_id.description: The organization id assigned to this organization by Grafana.
